website_summaries.verdict: The Polo Ralph Lauren Vaughn Saddle brings preppy to the forefront. The relaxed styling of the shoe is balanced by the premium combination of materials that make up the upper, producing footwear that can blend in casual gatherings and more formal occasions. The shoe is solidly built and comfortably made—a definite steal at such a competitive price.The shoe, however, has a few downsides. It attracts dirt quite easily and cleans off with difficulty. There is also no support in the footwear, and it runs bigger than regular sizing.
pros: Plenty of people described the Polo Ralph Lauren Vaughn Saddle as “comfortable.” They said it was ideal for taking long walks
A lot of consumers stated in their reviews that the low-top sneaker gave a perfect fit
Some testers described the quality of the casual footwear as “high.” They commended the durability and solid build of the sneaker
Many purchasers praised the versatile style of the Vaughn Saddle, saying it was relaxed enough for errand running yet stylish enough for dinners out
A few users were happy with the price of the lifestyle Polo Ralph Lauren model
They said the shoe gave great value for money
Several customers were delighted that their purchased footwear looked even better in person than pictured
They mentioned that this was because you can clearly see the nice contrast between the materials
One person noted how lightweight the Polo Ralph Lauren Vaughn Saddle is
cons: The Polo Ralph Lauren Vaughn Saddle was reported to run big by several purchasers
According to a handful of consumers, the low-top sneaker dirties very easily
They also reported that the suede part of the shoe was difficult to clean
The shoe provides no support, one buyer complained
A couple of individuals noted that their purchased shoes had darker colors in person than what was pictured

customer_reviews.title: Great look and great feel. Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am really pleased with these shoes. The first thing that caught my eye was the price. (Got them for $35 at the time.) And $35 for a pair of good looking Polo Ralph Lauren's?! That's a steal. The shoes came in quickly, and fit as expected. (I wear size 12-13 US, in this case 13.) They are relatively comfy to wear and look super good! The build looks and feels well-made and they seem pretty durable in terms of casual wear. These shoes pair up so nice with spring and summer outfits. So glad to have bought them. Hope to make some memories with these bad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Motavator

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed. Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cheaply built. I only wore them about 6 times and the heel blew out. I only bought them 10 weeks ago. Can't leave the seller feedback and can't return. My first time buying anything Polo. Now my last. They fit good while they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Navy pair, and I would say that the color is a tad bit darker than what is pictured. I figured this was the case from past experience so that was not a big deal for me. The shoes fit well, and are reasonably comfortable. These kinds of shoes are never overly comfortable, so look elsewhere if that is what you want. Otherwise, these looks look great and will attract lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lovely SHoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were of great quality and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, quality no so much
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Stylish. I've received compliments. -Leather is nice. -Shoe is comfortable. -Fits as expected. -They included fabric and rawhide laces, so you can choose which you want Cons (after only a month of wear): -Glue does not hold the rubber edge very well. -Rubber edge starts to tear and fall off at the stress points.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage nephew loves Polo Ralph Lauren, so I bought these as a Christmas gift. He LOVED them, insisting that he was going to wear them every day. They fit well, look good, and made one of my favorite people happy - what more can you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Mimsy

customer_reviews.title: These are great for casual professional attire
customer_reviews.text: These are great for casual professional attire. They rub a little but that's more my feet than any defect in the shoe design. Once my feet got used to them I was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than the photo
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than the photo. You can't see the contrasting materials very well. Comes with cloth laces if you don't like the leather. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gtmacdonald

customer_reviews.title: Barely worn and has holes
customer_reviews.text: Barely worn the shoes- only on social occasions- which are few and far between to a graduate student. 2 months in and... Shoes are uncomfortable, get worn out and get holes easily falling apart and leather is stripping off the heal. look nice- but fade fast.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: It has a few minor wrinkles because its fabric and its been shipped across the country to me but, they are brand new and as expected. fits like normal with no issues. they are a very nice pair of shoes if you ask me. go for it!
customer_reviews.author: IamTheBeatBoy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: They look great and are pretty sturdy, not to mention the reasonable price. I have had these for a little over a year, and they are just now beginning to tear at the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: the gray/blue on the front looks cool, but that brown looks terrible in real life
customer_reviews.text: the gray/blue on the front looks cool, but that brown looks terrible in real life, especially w/ the laces. also you can see the seams of the shoe underneath the white edge, which looks really cheap
customer_reviews.author: Mihai Bulic

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Fashion Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Vaughn Saddle Fashion Sneaker arrived well within estimated delivery time, this is a nice looking, nice fitting shoe, would buy another pair of these without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Vernon E. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES THEY GO GREAT WITH MY RED AND BLUE OUTFIT PERFECTLY.

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes however a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: Tight when I first tried them, however after walking around the house all day they seemed to have stretched out a it. Fit much better now. They could be a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Harleyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Probably my favorite shoes I own, fits great, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Kaehler

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time shopping here, and it really satisfied me very much 'cause Amazon's good service, fast delivery and of course the Polo Ralph Lauren's quality. I took the shoes immediately on my feet when I received them at first time. I am really happy because they are so comfortable and nice. They just fit well and make me walking so easy. I will definitely buy more Ralph's on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and stylish sneaker substitute. The only problem is that the light canvas shows dirt very quickly; the suede saddle makes it difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Size genuine, very good quality, strong canvas with great stitching, sole etc. really like the quality. Hey come with leather laces and a spare set of white laces. These will get a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: radioluke

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and the recipient loved them. Very cool and classy looking. The 'unfinished looking' leather strap shoelaces gives it a special touch. If you don't like them they also include a white pair of shoelaces.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: excelente
customer_reviews.text: Well, I just want to say that is an excellent seller, the product arrived in the time stated and in the state that was displayed on the website, checked it, I'm satisfied with the product and most importantly it is the same as that ls shown in photos, the same color, flawless and in perfect condition

customer_reviews.title: I liked the way they looked
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way they looked, but after almost a year I can see the sole separating from the rest of it. Luckily it doesn't rain out here in Cali much, but now they look old, worn and falling apart. The size was a tad bit too large. I would probably get a 1/2 size smaller.

customer_reviews.title: The Polo Version of Vans
customer_reviews.text: Great colors (grey and brown leather) but fits a bit snug. Sucks that the price changes drastically when you change the color and/or size. Have gotten alot of compliments and looks great with blues and khakis.

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my son who is in college for a Christmas gift. He loved them and they fit perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and satisfying than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing a shoe through online. The shoe was delivered later than expected but the overall quality was pretty good. I personally didn't like the leather shoelaces as they dropped little dusts and made the shoe messy. I recommend using the white shoelaces that comes with the shoes instead of the leather ones.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are wondeful. Tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I wear these shoes I get at least 1 new compliment from someone. The fit is perfect, they're comfortable, and work well with jeans, chinos, or shorts. I love these shoes! Well worth the $59.99 I paid.

customer_reviews.title: great buy

customer_reviews.title: US and European sizes don't correspond each other

customer_reviews.title: Not a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: They started to fall apart after only a couple months. Also there was very little padding. Not a great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband says their the most comfortable shoes he's ever had. He wore them for the first time on a weekend trip to pismo beach where we did a lot to walking

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but too big.
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful and look just as we expected and hoped, but they must run big. We will be having to return them for a size 8 and see of maybe there is a more narrow width.

customer_reviews.title: the best shoes for a birthday gift!!

customer_reviews.title: They fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these. After 35 days (5 days beyond return window) they fell apart. See photo.

customer_reviews.title: nice looking shoe...but

customer_reviews.text: These shoes made in China is pure synthetic and NOT leather! From the desciption you would expect leather upper material!

customer_reviews.title: I must say that the shoes are fantastic, despite of the size problem

product_meta.title: Polo Ralph Lauren Vaughn Saddle Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: Leather laces and accents decorate this saddle shoe-inspired sneaker.
feature_bullets: Leather laces and accents decorate this saddle shoe-inspired sneaker.
